packages

```{r}
install.packages("countrycode") 
```

```{r}
library(countrycode)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
```

load data

```{r}
shape <- st_read(
  "/Users/weiningl/CASA/05GISS/wk04/prac-data4/World_Countries_(Generalized)_9029012925078512962.geojson")

summary(shape)

plot(shape)
st_crs(shape)
```

```{r}
raw_data<- read.csv(here::here("/Users/weiningl/CASA/05GISS/wk04/prac-data4/HDR23-24_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv"),
                    header = TRUE, sep = ",", 
                    encoding = "latin1",
                    na = "n/a")
summary(raw_data)
```

select column

```{r}
GIIdata <- raw_data %>%
  select(1:4, "gii_2010", "gii_2019")
head(GIIdata)
```

*GIIdata* is iso3, *shape* is iso2 use `countrycode` package to Unify

```{r}
GIIdata$iso3c <- countrycode(sourcevar = GIIdata$country,
                             origin = "country.name",
                             destination = "iso3c")
```

```{r}
shape$iso3c <- countrycode(sourcevar = shape$COUNTRYAFF,
                             origin = "country.name",
                             destination = "iso3c")
```

Join the global gender inequality index to spatial data of the World

```{r}
merged_data <- shape %>%
  left_join(., 
            GIIdata, by = "iso3c")
merged_data%>%
  head(., n=10)
```

creating a new column of difference in inequality between 2010 and 2019

```{r}
merged_data$difference <- merged_data$gii_2019 - merged_data$gii_2010
```

plot

```{r}
tmap_mode("plot")
qtm(merged_data, 
    fill = "difference")
```

Advanced

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(merged_data) + 
  tm_polygons("difference", 
              style="pretty",
              palette="Blues",
              midpoint=NA,
              title="difference in GII",
              alpha = 0.5) + 
  tm_basemap(server = "CartoDB.Positron") +
  ## if you like, you can switch server = "OpenStreetMap" with server = "CartoDB.Positron"
  tm_compass(position = c("left", "bottom"),type = "arrow") + 
  tm_scale_bar(position = c("left", "bottom")) +
  tm_layout(title = "difference in gender inequality index between 2010 and 2019")
```
